Question
========

In a study of differences between nursing and care homes looked at, among other things, the age of the (502) residents in the sample. Age was divided into 5 classes for this purpose. The results are shown in the cross tabulation below:

  ----------------- ------- ------- ------- ------- ----- Frequency 50-64 65-74 75-84 85-94 ≥95 nursing home 4 27 96 108 14 nursing home 0 6 91 129 27 ----------------- ------- ------- ------- ------- -----

P(person from nursing home ∪ person over age 95) =

Answerlist
----------

* 0.028
* 0.52
* 0.55
* 0.58

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.028: Incorrect
* 0.52: Incorrect
* 0.55: Correct
* 0.58: Incorrect
